last_episode_to_air.name: Dark Side of the Sun
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Kate nears death, the team races to defeat Amaru and seal the gate to Xilbalba.

name: From Dusk Till Dawn: The Series
original_name: From Dusk Till Dawn: The Series
overview: The horror and crime thriller genres collide in this new original series from Robert Rodriguez, based on his cult grindhouse classic about bank-robbing brothers on the run, a lawman bent on bringing them to justice, the devout family caught in the cross-fire, and an ancient evil eager to feast on them all.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The Gecko brothers are wanted by the authorities after a bank heist leaves several dead. Escaping to mexico, chaos ensues when they take hostages and detour to a strip club that is populated by vampires.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, core relationships deepen and become more complicated as everyone tries to put their lives back on track after one very insane day. Santánico and Richie (living outside of Houston) are now partners in crime, resembling a more modern version of Bonnie and Clyde; Seth and Kate are scraping by as small time criminals south of the border; and Freddie Gonzalez has an almost obsessive focus on protecting his wife and young daughter in the suburbs. Carlos Madrigal and Scott Fuller emerge from the Titty Twister, changed men. They will all come together once again – this time facing off against an even bigger threat.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season three, the Gecko brothers find themselves in the vortex of the Culebra world, thrust into a fight against the forces of hell. The Geckos assemble an unlikely crew to take on the new enemies determined to take them down.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A pit stop at a liquor store leads to a deadly standoff for bank robbers Seth and Richie Gecko, who are making a run for the Mexican border.

episodes.name: Blood Runs Thick
episodes.overview: Richie's visions intensify as the Gecko Brothers escape the liquor store with dogged lawman Freddie Gonzalez in close pursuit.

episodes.name: Mistress
episodes.overview: While Richie deals with his visions, Seth and Carlos plan to cross the border. Meanwhile, the Fullers' RV breaks down and Ranger Gonzalez asks for help.

episodes.name: Let's Get Ramblin'
episodes.overview: The Gecko brothers attempt to leave the hotel and take the Fuller family hostage, but Freddie arrives and complicates the situation.

episodes.name: Self-Contained
episodes.overview: Seth escapes the motel and leads the Fullers' RV to the border. Meanwhile, Richie deals with an irrational fear; and Jacob is determined to get his children safely across the border.

episodes.name: Place of Dead Roads
episodes.overview: The Gecko brothers and the Fuller family find themselves in over their heads whilst Seth's deal with Carlos might not happen after all.

episodes.name: Pandemonium
episodes.overview: Gecko brothers and the Fuller family are watching the Santanico Pandemonium as Ranger Freddie Gonzalez shows up to exact revenge.

episodes.name: La Conquista
episodes.overview: As Santanico tries to turn Richie to her cause, Freddie confronts Carlos about his destiny and the temple's mysterious past. Seth, the Fullers, and Sex Machine battle their way deeper into the temple, where they meet an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: Boxman
episodes.overview: Seth and Richie face the labyrinth in the temple; Jacob and Kate confront Scott's transformation.

episodes.name: The Take
episodes.overview: Seth and Richie find they've been double-crossed; the Fullers confront their demons.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The Gecko brothers are wanted by the authorities after a bank heist leaves several dead. Escaping to mexico, chaos ensues when they take hostages and detour to a strip club that is populated by vampires.

episodes.name: Opening Night
episodes.overview: Three months after freeing Santanico from the Titty Twister, the Gecko Brothers are still on the run; Seth and Kate are lost in Mexico; Richie and Santanico plot vengeance on the culebra Lord.

episodes.name: In a Dark Time
episodes.overview: Seth and Kate stage a heist, while Gonzalez endures frightening visions that lead to a grisly discovery, and back at the Twister, Malvado's plans are set into motion by Carlo's emergence from the labyrinth.

episodes.name: Attack of the 50 ft. Sex Machine
episodes.overview: Richie and Santanico pose as sex traffickers to infiltrate Malvado’s food supply, while Sonja forces Seth to kick his drug habit. Meanwhile, Freddie faces off with Sex Machine, who attacks his family to retrieve the codex.

episodes.name: The Best Little Horror House In Texas
episodes.overview: Kate hunts down Scott in Bethel before he can exact revenge. In Houston, Richie and Santanico find themselves deep in the flesh trade, while Seth tries to get back in Uncle Eddie’s good graces.

episodes.name: Bondage
episodes.overview: Richie and Seth make peace and team up to look for Malvado's headquarters. Meanwhile, Carlos kidnaps Santanico; and Kate tries to save her brother with help from Freddie.

episodes.name: Bizarre Tales
episodes.overview: Following the trail of the mass grave, Freddie and Kate uncover epic secrets and confront Oculto, a reclusive and dangerous Lord. Seth and Richie take the girls on a double date, and Carlos lets go of the past.

episodes.name: Bring Me the Head of Santanico Pandemonium
episodes.overview: Uncle Eddie helps Rich and Seth make a plan to complete Santanico's revenge. Meanwhile, Freddie and Kate encounter an unexpected foe following Malvado's attack.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Richard Gecko
There Will Be Blood
episodes.overview: Santanico confronts Malvado with Seth's help; Richie and Kate must stop Carlos and Scott from overturning the ancient prophecy and taking control of a powerful evil.

episodes.name: Santa Sangre
episodes.overview: Seth and Santanico clash with Richie over his betrayal, while Carlos and Scott aim to take Malvado’s empire and unleash culebra frenzy on the world.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, core relationships deepen and become more complicated as everyone tries to put their lives back on track after one very insane day. Santánico and Richie (living outside of Houston) are now partners in crime, resembling a more modern version of Bonnie and Clyde; Seth and Kate are scraping by as small time criminals south of the border; and Freddie Gonzalez has an almost obsessive focus on protecting his wife and young daughter in the suburbs. Carlos Madrigal and Scott Fuller emerge from the Titty Twister, changed men. They will all come together once again – this time facing off against an even bigger threat.

episodes.name: Head Games
episodes.overview: The Geckos have been demoted to “collectors”, while their organization has been infiltrated by a mysterious new enemy hell-bent on destroying them, the Lords, and all culebras.

episodes.name: La Reina
episodes.overview: Seth and Richie seek help from Santanico Pandemonium, only to discover she’s the target of the Xibalban leader, an ancient queen who has taken on a familiar form. Meanwhile, Freddie and Ximena follow a trail of massacres to a deadly confrontation with Brasa.

episodes.name: Protect and Serve
episodes.overview: Freddie joins forces with an old enemy in order to destroy a demon who's enslaving culebras. Seth and Richie track down an ancient hunter.

episodes.name: Fanglorious
episodes.overview: Ranger Freddie Gonzalez teams with an old enemy; the Geckos must defend against the Jaguar Warriors.

episodes.name: Shady Glen
episodes.overview: Seth and his team protect civilians from cannibal attacks.

episodes.name: Straightjacket
episodes.overview: Richie wakes up in an abandoned asylum after being abducted. Seth goes to save Richie.

episodes.name: La Llorona
episodes.overview: The team falls victim to a female Xibalban demon.

episodes.name: Rio Sangre
episodes.overview: Santanico returns with a secret and leads the Geckos to Lord Venganza.

episodes.name: Matanzas
episodes.overview: The Geckos are going after Amaru, as she plots to regain her true form and open the gates of Hell.

episodes.name: Dark Side of the Sun
episodes.overview: As Kate nears death, the team races to defeat Amaru and seal the gate to Xilbalba.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season three, the Gecko brothers find themselves in the vortex of the Culebra world, thrust into a fight against the forces of hell. The Geckos assemble an unlikely crew to take on the new enemies determined to take them down.
